sentences.en: And the omniscient gentlemen always said, indeed they would.
sentences.cn: 无所不知的男人们就总是说一定会回来的.

sentences.en: As a study aid, it is convenient, inexpensive and almost omniscient.
sentences.cn: 作为学者的助手, 辞典方便 、 便宜,几乎无所不有.

sentences.en: Christians believe that God is omniscient.
sentences.cn: 基督教徒相信上帝是无所不知的.

sentences.en: Combining omniscient narrative, limited narrative with objective narrative A Dream of Red Mansions achieves unprecedented achievements.
sentences.cn: 《红楼梦》将全知叙事 、 限制叙事和客观叙事紧密结合,并取得前所未有的成就.

sentences.en: God is not only omniscient and omnipresent.
sentences.cn: 神不仅仅是无所不知、无所不在的.

sentences.en: He's nervous when trying to potray himself as omniscient.
sentences.cn: 当他试图把自己描绘得无所不知时，内心其实很紧张。

sentences.en: I do not pretend to be omniscient, but am positive about this fact.
sentences.cn: 我不假装是无所不知, 但我肯定了这一事实.

sentences.en: If God were not omniscient ( the human heart ) would deceive him.
sentences.cn: 人类罪 深沈 的问题蕴藏在他内心之中.

sentences.en: One of those omniscient and awe - inspiring marvels, a detective, came up from St.
sentences.cn: 从圣路易斯那些神通广大、令人敬畏的非凡人物中, 派来了一名侦探.

sentences.en: That ever - enduring, ego - less, omniscient Awareness or Knowingness is the True Self.
sentences.cn: 这曾经经历, 缺乏 自我, 无所不知或知道是真实的自我.
本书中全知全能的叙事者

sentences.en: The God is finite, and can not be omniscient, omnipotent.
sentences.cn: 上帝是有限的, 而不是无所不知 、 无所不能的.

sentences.en: Then the mind stuff , reflecting both the knower and the knowable, becomes omniscient.
sentences.cn: 由此灵性本体如被知觉者与认知二者一体共同映现, 则成为全知.

sentences.en: Too many assume that people behave like the mythical homo economics, who is hyperrational and omniscient.
sentences.cn: 他们有太多人假设人们都是神话般的既高度理性又无所不知的人经济人.

words.tran_cn: 全知；上帝；全知者；无限的知识
